metadata.title: CVE-2021-44510 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, attackers can cause a calculationof the size of calls to memset in op_fnj3 in sr_port/op_fnj3.c to result inan extremely large value in order to cause a segmentation fault and crashthe application.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
